headline: Is Axon (AXON) Quietly Recasting Its Risk Profile With Debt Moves And AI-Driven Contracts?
summary: In recent months, Axon Enterprise moved to redeem all of its 0.50% convertible senior notes due 2027 early, while also pursuing debt repurchase options to reshape its balance sheet and funding mix. At the same time, Axon has been winning multi-year public-sector contracts for AI-enabled body cameras, cloud services, and drones, reinforcing its shift toward higher-margin, recurring software and services revenue. We’ll now examine how Axon’s accelerating software and services momentum...
